snippet: Crystal Palace chairman Steve Parish has assured under-pressure manager Alan Pardew that his job is secure and said he was a "positive force" at the Premier League club....

headline.main: Pardew's Job as Manager Is Safe, Says Palace Chairman
headline.print_headline: Pardew's Job as Manager Is Safe, Says Palace Chairman

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace chairman Steve Parish has assured under-pressure manager Alan Pardew that his job is secure and said he was a "positive force" at the Premier League club.

snippet: Aston Villa have suspended long-serving striker Gabriel Agbonlahor and launched an internal investigation after he was pictured by British media on a laughing gas and booze binge on the day his club were relegated from the Premier League....

headline.main: Villa Suspend Agbonlahor Over Laughing Gas Scandal
headline.print_headline: Villa Suspend Agbonlahor Over Laughing Gas Scandal

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have suspended long-serving striker Gabriel Agbonlahor and launched an internal investigation after he was pictured by British media on a laughing gas and booze binge on the day his club were relegated from the Premier League.

snippet: Leicester City must ensure they maintain their rapid progress beyond the current campaign, manager Claudio Ranieri said ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash against third-placed Arsenal....

headline.main: Leicester Must Continue to Grow Beyond This Season-Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Leicester Must Continue to Grow Beyond This Season-Ranieri

lead_paragraph: Leicester City must ensure they maintain their rapid progress beyond the current campaign, manager Claudio Ranieri said ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash against third-placed Arsenal.

snippet: Leicester City defender Danny Simpson is hopeful that striker Jamie Vardy will reject the overtures of Arsenal and still be at the Premier League champions when the new season kicks off....

headline.main: Simpson Hopes Team Mate Vardy Stays at Leicester
headline.print_headline: Simpson Hopes Team Mate Vardy Stays at Leicester

lead_paragraph: Leicester City defender Danny Simpson is hopeful that striker Jamie Vardy will reject the overtures of Arsenal and still be at the Premier League champions when the new season kicks off.

snippet: Swansea City captain Leon Briton believes his team have proved they have the battling qualities to survive the Premier League relegation dogfight after thrashing fellow strugglers Sunderland 3-0 on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Swansea Have Stomach to Survive Relegation Scrap, Says Britton

lead_paragraph: Swansea City captain Leon Briton believes his team have proved they have the battling qualities to survive the Premier League relegation dogfight after thrashing fellow strugglers Sunderland 3-0 on Saturday.

snippet: Gareth Barry is the perfect player for Everton, manager Ronald Koeman has said after the midfielder scored in his 600th Premier League appearance to help the club beat Middlesbrough 3-1....

snippet: Everton have signed Senegal midfielder Idrissa Gueye on a four-year deal from second-tier Aston Villa, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Senegal's Gueye Joins Everton on Four-Year Deal From Villa

lead_paragraph: Everton have signed Senegal midfielder Idrissa Gueye on a four-year deal from second-tier Aston Villa, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Newcastle United thanked the club's fans for their support after their relegation from the Premier League was confirmed on Wednesday....
